full_text:
Welcome... ;)

Yes, I have had that happen and would suggest that somebody was 
trying to get your attention, perhaps.  We seem to be more "open" to 
spirit communication during, before and after sleep.  The left brain 
calmes down and the right brain becomes un-suppressed and able 
to "tune-in" in my opinion.  ;)

LC
